verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees. <WH4609> In my distress <WH6869> I cried <WH7121> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and he heard <WH6030> me.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul, <WH5315> O LORD, <WH3068> from lying <WH8267> lips, <WH4480> <WH8193> and from a deceitful <WH7423> tongue. <WH4480> <WH3956>
What <WH4100> shall be given <WH5414> unto thee? or what <WH4100> shall be done <WH3254> unto thee, thou false <WH7423> tongue? <WH3956>
Sharp <WH8150> arrows <WH2671> of the mighty, <WH1368> with <WH5973> coals <WH1513> of juniper. <WH7574>
Woe <WH190> is me, that <WH3588> I sojourn <WH1481> in Mesech, <WH4902> that I dwell <WH7931> in <WH5973> the tents <WH168> of Kedar! <WH6938>
My soul <WH5315> hath long <WH7227> dwelt <WH7931> with <WH5973> him that hateth <WH8130> peace. <WH7965>
I <WH589> am for peace: <WH7965> but when <WH3588> I speak, <WH1696> they <WH1992> are for war. <WH4421>
